description.narrative: The Project seeks to provide long term financing to a municipal enterprise of the City of Lviv, Lvivelektrotrans (LET), which shall be used for (i) the acquisition of trolleybuses with autonomous capacity and in-motion charging, and (ii) the rehabilitation of catenary lines.

The most significant project outcome is a reduction in the environmental footprint of Lviv's public transport derived from the modernization of Lvivelectrotrans (LET) fleet with a new generation of trolleybuses with autonomous course and in-motion charging technology, which will contribute to increase the share of public transport demand served with electric vehicles and higher quality standards. IFC anticipates the investment will promote greater integration of municipal infrastructure to debt capital markets by opening access of subnational entities to long-term local currency debt instruments.
